greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Number of toothpicks or D-toothpicks added at n-th stage to the structure of A194442.
comment: Essentially the first differences of A194442. It appears that the structure of the "narrow" triangle is much more regular about n=2^k, see formula section.
link: N. J. A. Sloane, Catalog of Toothpick and Cellular Automata Sequences in the OEIS
Index entries for sequences related to toothpick sequences
example: It appears that rows converge to A194697.
results.author: _Omar E. Pol_, Aug 29 2011
